title: We love: fashion fixes for the week ahead – in pictures
description: Liam Gallagher has teamed up with Berghaus, Timex’s iconic T80 watch gets a makeover and Zara collaborates with Hungarian label Nanushka Continue reading...
author: Jo Jones and Helen Seamons
excerpt: Liam Gallagher has teamed up with Berghaus, Timex’s iconic T80 watch gets a makeover and Zara collaborates with Hungarian label Nanushka
text: Hungarian empireZara’s collaboration with Hungarian label Nanushka, launching 28 October, is dedicated to menswear, jewellery and home accessories. The collection includes a refined blend of tailored and oversized silhouettes, including sleek, fitted jackets, wide-leg pleated trousers, structured wool coats, knitwear and cosy jacquard fleece sets. Accessories range from minimalist jewellery to hats, belts, bags, and footwear, including mules and mid-rise boots.From £22.99 to £199, zara.com
html:
Hungarian empire

Zara’s collaboration with Hungarian label Nanushka, launching 28 October, is dedicated to menswear, jewellery and home accessories. The collection includes a refined blend of tailored and oversized silhouettes, including sleek, fitted jackets, wide-leg pleated trousers, structured wool coats, knitwear and cosy jacquard fleece sets. Accessories range from minimalist jewellery to hats, belts, bags, and footwear, including mules and mid-rise boots.From £22.99 to £199, zara.com
